tool_definition.name: read_lints
tool_definition.description: Read and display linter errors from the current workspace

paths.description: Optional. An array of paths to files or directories to read linter errors for. You can use either relative paths in the workspace or absolute paths. If provided, returns diagnostics for the specified files/directories only. If not provided, returns diagnostics for all files in the workspace.

check_single_file.description: Check linting errors in a single file

check_multiple_files.description: Check linting errors in multiple files

check_directory.description: Check linting errors in all files within a directory

check_all_files.description: Check linting errors in all files in the workspace

output_format.description: When linting errors are found, the output typically includes:

errors.message: Unexpected any. Specify a different type.

after_editing_file.description: Check for linting errors after making code changes

before_commit.description: Check all modified files before committing

project_wide_check.description: Check entire project for linting issues
